thread.title: 2017 Mazda 3 2.5L Sedan Test: It’s Still Good
thread.title_full: 2017 Mazda 3 2.5L Sedan Test: It’s Still Good

author: Joseph Capparella
title: 2017 Mazda 3 2.5L Sedan Test: It’s Still Good
text:
-Today’s compact-car buyer is spoiled for choice, with the Mazda 3 being a prime example. It can be had as a sedan or a hatchback, with a 2.0-liter or a 2.5-liter engine, and with either a six-speed manual or a six-speed automatic transmission. READ MORE ›› 
-
